name: DayManager
0:
”Alexa, ask Day Manager to add Sam.”
”Alexa, open Day Manager and list tasks for Ryan.”
”Alexa, ask Day Manager to remove task 2 for Sam.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: day manager
des: With Day Manager you can add to dos for different people, add tasks , remove tasks when done and maintain to dos for different people. This will help to boost the productivity not for a single person but for whole organization.
